thread.title: Friday’s Travel News: An Eco-Trip in Borneo and Other Tours
thread.title_full: Friday’s Travel News: An Eco-Trip in Borneo and Other Tours - The New York Times

author: Elaine Glusac
title: Friday’s Travel News: An Eco-Trip in Borneo and Other Tours
text:
Our weekday morning digest that includes information about outdoor activities and events, with deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
BORNEO TOURS FOR THE INTREPID
In Transit Travel news, deals and tips, written by the editors and reporters of the Travel section. Can a Hotel Robot Read a ‘Do Not Disturb’ Sign?
